title: Heera Neelam Satlada Haaram - Regal Diamond and Sapphire Necklace
materials: 18K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity
G color) and vibrant blue sapphires with a round cut. Accented with carefully selected emeralds to add contrast.
features: This Satlada Haaram showcases intricate floral motifs in a layered design. The pendant features a unique openwork design inspired by Mughal architecture. The delicate diamond setting enhances the sparkle of the gemstones. Features the timeless Nizam design.
colors: creating a rich and opulent color palette.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for muhurtham
and other traditional South Indian ceremonies. Also suitable for high-end parties and special events where you want to make a statement.
description: A timeless heirloom piece showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and luxurious materials. The layered design adds a touch of grandeur, while the intricate floral motifs and delicate gemstone settings create a sophisticated look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. Its design is a fusion of tradition and luxury.
